page.title: 04HOMELIFE IN TARBERT,HARRIS
page.content:
For this we concentrated on the most common items found in homes today, cars,televisions,radios,and computers, we also found the proportion of Gaelic speakers in the area because here a lot of the conversation in our homes will be in Gaelic.
In all but one of the houses we visited there is a radio,87.9% of homes own a television,55% own a car and only 8.3% own a computer.
In all we surveyed 108 homes in which 280 people live,189 of whom are Gaelic speakers and therefore bilingual.
